questions.nameText: If a matrix A is such that 3 A3+2 A2+5 A+I=0, then A-1  is equal to

We have,

3 A3+2 A2+5 A+I=0

⇒I A-1=-3 A3-2 A2-5 AA-1

⇒A-1=-3 A2-2 A-5 I

questions.name: Let p is a non-singular matrix such that 1+p+p2+...+pn=O (O denotes the null matrix), then p-1 is
questions.nameText: Let p is a non-singular matrix such that 1+p+p2+...+pn=O (O denotes the null matrix), then p-1  is
questions.solution:
Given that, p is a non-singular matrix such that

1+p+p2+...+pn=O

⇒ 1+p1+p+p2+...+pn=O

⇒ 1-pn+1=O

⇒  pn+1=1

⇒  pn×p1=1

⇒  pn=1/p

∴  p-1=pn

questions.name: If 1         -tan⁡θtan⁡θ            1  1        tan⁡θ-tan⁡θ          1-1 a   -bb         a, then
questions.nameText: If 1         -tan⁡θtan⁡θ            1  1        tan⁡θ-tan⁡θ          1-1 a   -bb         a, then
questions.solution:
Given 1         -tan⁡θtan⁡θ            1  1        tan⁡θ-tan⁡θ          1-1=a  -bb      a

⇒1         -tan⁡θtan⁡θ            1.11+tan2⁡θ1         -tan⁡θtan⁡θ            1=a  -bb      a

⇒11+tan2⁡θ1-tan2⁡θ  -2 tan θ2tan⁡θ       1-tan2⁡θ=a  -bb       a

⇒1-tan2⁡θ1+tan2⁡θ2tan⁡θ1+tan2⁡θ2tan⁡θ1+tan2⁡θ1-tan2⁡θ1+tan2⁡θ=a  -bb       a

⇒cos⁡2θ-sin⁡2θsin⁡2θcos⁡2θ=a  –bb      a

⇒   a=cos⁡2θ,    b=sin⁡2θ

questions.name: The values of x, y, z in order, if the system of equations 3x+y+2z=3, 2x-3y-z=-3,  x+2y+z=4 has unique solution, are
questions.nameText: The values of x, y, z in order, if the system of equations 3x+y+2z=3, 2x-3y-z=-3,  x+2y+z=4 has unique solution, are
questions.solution:
Given equations are

3x+y+2z=3 …(i)

2x-3y-z=-3 …(ii)

and x+2y+z=4 …(iii)

Let A=3122-3-1121,  B=3-34,  X=xyz

∴  A=3122-3-1121

=3-3-121-12-111+22-312

=3-3+2-12+1+2(4+3)

=-3-3+14=8

adj. A=-1-3731-557-11T

=-135-3177-5-11

∴  A-1=1Aadj A=18-135-3177-5-11

Now, X=A-1B

=18-135-3177-5-113-34

=18-3-9+20-9-3+2821+15-44=18816-8

⇒ xyz=12-1

⇒  x=1, y=2, z=-1

questions.name: The system of equations 2x+y-5=0, x-2y+1=0,2x-14y-a=0, is consistent. Then, a is equal to
questions.nameText: The system of equations 2x+y-5=0, x-2y+1=0,2x-14y-a=0, is consistent. Then, a is equal to
questions.solution:
The given system of equations are

2x+y-5=0                        …(i)

x-2y+1=0                        …(ii)

and 2x-14y-a=0                    …(iii)

This system is consistent.

∴2      1  -51  -2         12 -14  -a=0

⇒22a+14—1-a-2-5-14+4=0

⇒4a+28+a+2+50=0

⇒5a=-80       ⇒   a=-16

questions.nameText: If A=1234, then I+A+A2+A3+…∞ equals to
questions.solution:

⇒BI-A=I

⇒B=I-A-1

⇒B=0-2-3-3-1=-16-3230=1/2-1/3-1/20

questions.nameText: If A2-A+I=0, then the inverse of A is

If A is any square matrix, then

AA-1=I andA-1I=A-1

Since, A2-A+I=O

⇒   A-1A A-A-1A+A-1=0

⇒    A-1+A-1=0⇒A-1=I-A

If we put x=1 , then column Ist and IIIrd are identical.

questions.name: The value of 111213121314131415, is
The value of cos⁡(x-a)cos⁡(x+a)cos⁡xsin⁡(x+a)sin⁡(x-a)sin⁡xcos a⁡ tan⁡xcos⁡acot⁡xcosec 2x is equal
questions.nameText: The  value of cos⁡(x-a)cos⁡(x+a)cos⁡xsin⁡(x+a)sin⁡(x-a)sin⁡xcos a⁡ tan⁡xcos⁡acot⁡xcosec 2x   is equal
questions.solution:
cos⁡(x-a)cos⁡(x+a)cos⁡xsin⁡(x+a)sin⁡(x-a)sin⁡xcos a⁡ tan⁡xcos⁡acot⁡xcosec 2x

cos⁡x-a+cos⁡(x-a)cos⁡(x+a)cos⁡xsinx+a+sin⁡(x-a)sin⁡(x-a)sin⁡xcos a⁡ (tan⁡x+cot⁡x)cos⁡acot⁡xcosec 2x

=2cos⁡xcos⁡acos⁡(x+a)cos⁡x2sin⁡xcos⁡asin⁡(x-a)sin⁡xcos a⁡tan2⁡x+1tan⁡xcos⁡acot⁡xcosec 2x

=2cos⁡acos⁡xcos⁡(x+a)cos⁡xsin⁡xsin⁡(x-a)sin⁡xcosec 2xcos⁡acot⁡xcosec 2x=0 [∵ two columns are identical]

questions.name:
If x2+x3x-1-x+32x+12+x2x3-3x-3x2+43x=a0+a1x+a2x2+.…+a7x7,

The value of a0 is
questions.nameText:
If x2+x3x-1-x+32x+12+x2x3-3x-3x2+43x=a0+a1x+a2x2+.…+a7x7, 

The value of a0 is
questions.solution:
Putting x=0 in the given determinant equation we get

a0=0-1312-3-340

=10-9+34+6

=30-9=21

questions.name: If acot⁡A2λbcot⁡B2μccot⁡C2γ=0 where, a,b,c A,B and C are elements of a ∆ABC with usual meaning. Then, the value of aμ-γ+bγ-λ+c(λ-μ) is
questions.nameText: If acot⁡A2λbcot⁡B2μccot⁡C2γ=0 where, a,b,c A,B and C are elements of a ∆ABC with usual meaning. Then, the value of aμ-γ+bγ-λ+c(λ-μ) is
questions.solution:
Given, acot⁡A2λbcot⁡B2μccot⁡C2γ=0

⇒ as(s-a)∆λbs(s-b)∆μcs(s-c)∆γ=0 ) ∵cot⁡A2=s(s-a)(s-a)(s-b)(s-c)=s(s-a)∆ )

⇒1ras-aλbs-bμcs-cγ=0   where r=∆s

Applying C2→C2+C1

⇒1rasλbsμcsγ=0

⇒∆r2a1λb1μc1γ=0

Applying R1→R1-R2, R2→R2-R3

⇒ ∆r2a-b0λ-μb-c0μ-γc1γ=0

⇒ ∆r2b-cλ-μ-μ-γa-b=0

⇒bλ-μ-cλ-μ-aμ-γ+bμ-γ=0

⇒ -aμ-γ+bλ-μ+μ-γ-cλ-μ=0

⇒ -aμ-γ+bλ-γ-cλ-μ=0

⇒aμ-γ+bγ-λ+cλ-μ=0
